This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

Consent Selection

**Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

[Show details](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)

Details

- Necessary 7







Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.







- [Adobe Inc.\\
2](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")


**com.adobe.reactor.dataElements.Domain** Necessary for the general functionality of the website. The cookie determines the API Endpoint.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage





**test** Used to detect if the visitor has accepted the marketing category in the cookie banner. This cookie is necessary for GDPR-compliance of the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- [Cookiebot\\
1](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.cookiebot.com/goto/privacy-policy/ "Cookiebot's privacy policy")


**CookieConsent** Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- [Páginas Amarillas\\
2](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.paginasamarillas.es/politica-privacidad "Páginas Amarillas's privacy policy")


**incap\_ses\_#** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**visid\_incap\_#** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- [cdn.userway.org\\
1](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)


**uw-icon-locales** Used to keep settings on the website's accessibility widget. This helps people with e.g. vision disabilities to properly navigate the site.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage

- [eu-assets.i.posthog.com\\
1](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)


**dmn\_chk\_#** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie


- Preferences 0







Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.









We do not use cookies of this type.

- Statistics 7







Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.







- [Adobe Inc.\\
2](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")


**AMCV\_#** Unique user ID that recognizes the user on returning visits

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**AMCVS\_#AdobeOrg** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- [Amazon\\
3](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=footer_privacy?ie=UTF8&nodeId=468496 "Amazon's privacy policy")


**snowplowOutQueue\_snowplow\_cf** Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage





**\_sp\_id.#** Collects data on the user's visits to the website, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been loaded with the purpose of generating reports for optimising the website content.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**\_sp\_ses.#** Used by Snowplow Analytics to track how users are browsing and engaging with a website.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- [site-assets.cdnmns.com\\
2](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)


**s\_cc** Used to check if the user's browser supports cookies.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**b/ss/#/1/#/s#** Registers data on visitors' website-behaviour. This is used for internal analysis and website optimization.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: Pixel Tracker


- Marketing 8







Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.







- [Adobe Inc.\\
6](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")


**com.adobe.reactor.dataElements.Referrer** Collects data on visitors' behaviour and interaction - This is used to make advertisement on the website more relevant. The cookie also allows the website to detect any referrals from other websites.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage





**\_dp** This cookie is set by the audience manager of a website in order to determine if any additional third-party cookies can be set in the visitor’s browser – third-party cookies are used to gather information or track visitor behavior on multiple websites. Third-party cookies are set by a third-party website or company.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**demdex** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 180 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**dpm** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 180 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**everest\_g\_v2** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**everest\_session\_v2** Used for targeted ads and to document efficacy of each individual ad.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie

- [Google\\
2](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")


Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.



**\_ga** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie





**\_ga\_#** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.

**Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie


- Unclassified 8

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.







- [Páginas Amarillas\\
2](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#) [Learn more about this provider![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://www.paginasamarillas.es/politica-privacidad "Páginas Amarillas's privacy policy")

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage

3](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)


**uw-tunings** Pending

**uw-tunings-checksum** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage





**uw-uid** Pending

**Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage

About

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient.

The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.

This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.

You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.

Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy.

Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your consent.

**Do not sell or share my personal information**

Allow allCustomize cookies

Allow selectionDeny

# Venta de mármol en Longra, Vigo

## Quiénes somos

Somos Mármoles Alonso, una reconocida empresa dedicada a la venta de mármoles y granitos de calidad. Visítenos, estamos situados en Longra, Vigo.​

[![Mármoles Alonso cocina de mármol ](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/uploads/0CGeO1aR/737x0_555x0/marmoles-alonso-cocina-de-marmol.jpg)](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)

[![Mármoles Alonso mesa de mármol ](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/uploads/HDb2elfI/737x0_555x0/marmoles-alonso-mesa-de-marmol.jpg)](https://www.marmolesalonso.net/#)

## Nosotros

Contamos con personal cualificado, así como con las herramientas necesarias para darle una buena atención. Contacte con nosotros y compruébelo.​

Expertos en mármoles

## Dónde estamos

## Dirección

Camino Viño, 14 - bajo

36330 Longra, Vigo (Pontevedra)

## Teléfono

[986 239 379](tel:986239379)

## E-mail

[alonso\_vila@asemaco.es](mailto:alonso_vila@asemaco.es)

[iframe](https://maps.google.com/maps?width=100%&hl=en&q=Camino%20Vi%C3%B1o%2C%2014%20-%20bajo%2036330%20Longra%2C%20Vigo%20ES&ie=UTF8&t=&z=14&iwloc=B&output=embed)
